description.value: Most of the [zib InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)) will be mapped onto the `.dosageInstruction` element found in several medication resources. However, the concept Description cannot be placed in this element, hence a custom extension is used that extends the resource and not the Dosage datatype.

purpose.value: This extension represents the Description concept of [zib zib InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN))
